titles.title: Supporting increased awareness of sepsis and the importance of early diagnosis and appropriate intervention.
Supporting increased awareness of sepsis and the importance of early diagnosis and appropriate intervention.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Commits to increasing awareness of sepsis.
Expresses support for: (1) innovative public-private partnerships, and (2) the pursuit of mechanisms to accelerate the pursuit of improved early detection and intervention for patients with sepsis.
